entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rocky Mountain House 2:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 7.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 43 %
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: NNW 24 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
